author: Josh Billinghurst
comment: Thank you so much for updating. This is my favorite watch face and ai was pretty bummed when the wear 2.0 update broke the location feature
Thought it was widget

author: Donald Wilson
comment: Is exactly the watch face I want. Sad it doesn't fill the entire screen of my ZTE quartz

author: Rob Prior
comment: Almost perfect... How can I scale it to fill my watch screen?  It comes up about 15% smaller than full screen...

author: Adonis
comment: Love it -- Please! if at all possible, make it so there's option to keep the 01-12 numbering on the PM side.

author: Piotr Meszynski
comment: Just perfect. More color options would be a nice feature, but more than usable as is. I would definitely pay for this watch face.

author: Cory Ballew
comment: Looks great on ASUS Zenwatch 2!

author: Nuno Albuquerque
comment: Hello! This is a great face!!! Liked the 24H panel and the sunset/sunrise calculation. However, it is not been calculated now. I tried to reboot and uninstall / install. ... , but can't  solve the issue.  I also get 1 or 2 black screens  (freezed?).

reply.author: staticfree.info
reply.content: The latest revision should fix sunrise/sunset!

title: Good looking face, but with some issues

author: Nicholas Anderson
comment: I really like the 12-at-the-top 24 hour display, but this needs quite a bit to get a better rating, IMHO.  1. The sunrise/sunset doesn't seem to work and in that absence has a pretty ugly alternative in the center. 2. An option to display a digital clock there instead would be great.  3. Colors!  Those said, watch faces in this style are SO FEW!  I really hope some options are added because I would change to 5 stars immediately.

reply.author: staticfree.info
reply.content:
The latest revision should fix sunrise/sunset!

I don't have any options yet, as this is a hobby project of mine and time is limited. It's open source and contributions are welcome! (twilight/noon was one of them!)

author: Chris Pugh
comment: The watch face appears to be centred and is too small on the Huawei watch. Otherwise, this is a great idea, so I'd love to see that resolved.
title: Great, but doesn't fit on a Huawei Watch

author: Trevor Graves
comment: The watch face does not fill the screen of the gear, there is a visible border around all 4 sides. Despite the minor issue, it is my favorite watch face.
title: Galaxy gear live

author: David Traumann
comment: A great base for a 24 hours watch face. Now it needs a huge list of options starting with custom colors, a third hand etc. Looking forward to future updates.

reply.author: staticfree.info
reply.content: I hope to add a theming engine eventually! This is a hobby project of mine, so options come as I have time. It's also open source, so contributions are welcome :-)

title: Very rare

author: Lee Fleming
comment: Got my sunrise/sunset/twilight shade back. After the 5.1.1 update just open Google maps on your watch. Now just a better font please.

author: Ivan Keung
comment: Looking forward for the customizable version. But please consider to make the fonts / hands a little bit thicker / bigger as they were not shown up very well on transflective screen. Thanks.
title: Great

author: matt atchley
comment: Reminds me of my YES watch. Only thing that would make it better would be some color and customizing options. Thanks!

reply.author: staticfree.info
reply.content: Color and customization options are something I've been considering. The current plan is to make a general theming system, so people can do whatever faces they desire.

title: Awesome

author: Josh Eaton
comment: Even though the sunrise sunset rarely works. It would be even better if there were some color options too.

reply.author: staticfree.info
reply.content: The latest revision should fix sunrise/sunset!

title: I really like this

author: Bo Stone
comment: And functional. But it sucked my moto 360 dry in half a day and I don't even run in ambient mode

reply.author: staticfree.info
reply.content: Interesting! It shouldn't be causing crazy battery drain any more than any other watch face. Send me an email at steve@staticfree.info and we'll try to fix this!

title: Awesome looking

author: Timothy Oliver
comment: Please add the option of a single hand, color choices, date and weather complications
title: I Like But Please Add

author: Daniel Norman
comment: I like this face a lot but it does not fill the screen on my Gear Live. It's square like it should be but it does not reach the edges of the screen.
title: Cool watchmaker with a small design issue.

author: Sean Summers
comment: With the hint to load Maps on the watch to update Sunrise/set, everything works and look beautiful!
title: Works!

author: Steven Post
comment: As of 1/12/17, the sunrise/sunset function is working again, and this is hands down my favorite watch face!

author: Jason Priest
comment: Thanks for bringing this to Wear. A 24 hour Raketa mechanical is what got me interested in watches to begin with. With my love for astronomical data, this is perfect.

author: Raúl Beristáin
comment: Great concept, but on Asus Zen watch one it didn't quite fill the screen.
title: Almost there

author: Patrick Waghorn
comment: Still the only one i can find, but it will do well done.
title: 24hour watch face

author: Santiago Lezcano
comment: Consume mucha carga.

author: Adam A
comment: Looks great. If only I'm good at Redding a 24 clock
title: Great

author: Kazi VII Stormware
comment: Please fix the sunrise sunset timings

reply.author: staticfree.info
reply.content: The latest revision should fix sunrise/sunset!

author: Kamila Součková
comment: And open-source! Thank you :-)
title: Awesome!

author: Mehdi Mirahmadi
comment: Moto 360

reply.author: staticfree.info
reply.content: I'd love to know what you think I should do to improve it!

author: Ashim Sagar
comment: Nice but how to upload on the watch?
title: Nice but ....

comment: Love the automatic sunrise/sunset indicator. Thanks for releasing this as free software!
title: Beautiful and functional design

author: Reuben Janzen-Martin
comment: I really like the look of this clock. Can you make it a widget so I can use it on my phone?
title: Make it a widget please

author: Adrian Cavanagh
comment: It doesn't fill the whole screen on my Huawei Watch. I can't believe there's not more 24 hour analog watch faces out there!
title: I like it, but...
